summary: The llms package supplies a suite of provider adapters that map Litellmâ€‘style calls to the native APIs of numerous large language model services. Each adapter encapsulates configuration, authentication, request construction, response parsing, error handling, and optional streaming or asynchronous execution, presenting a uniform interface for completions, chat, embeddings, and other model capabilities across providers.
business_intent: Offer developers a single, consistent SDK to access a wide range of LLM APIs, minimizing integration complexity and enabling flexible model selection within applications.
